alert.note: Alert for Gallatin and Madison County Mountains and Centennial Mountains (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued October 12 at 2:12AM MDT until October 12 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow expected above 7000 feet. Additional snow accumulations of up to 3 inches between 7000 and 8000 feet, with up to 10 inches and locally higher above 8000 feet. Winds may gust as high as 35 mph at times. * WHERE...Gallatin and Madison County Mountains and Centennial Mountains. * WHEN...Until 6 PM MDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Slippery travel is possible at times along portions of Highway 191 and Highway 64. Cold and raw backcountry conditions will exist, which could become hazardous to those who are are unprepared. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Periods of heavier precipitation may aid in lowering snow levels to as low as 6000 feet at times.
info.instruction: The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or visiting the MDT Road Report website.

area.areaDesc: Gallatin and Madison County Mountains and Centennial Mountains
